room_title: Escape room "Time Warp" by Time Escape in Seattle
review: I did two of the rooms: “Time Warp” and “Presidential Assassination”.In no way can they be compared, I wasn’t able to solve the time warp theme but absolutely loved it and decided to come back to try another one. The hi tech, interactive puzzle and the thrill of adventure was amazing!The president room was OK, but was not very fun. Some of the puzzles felt like a hassle and not very inspiring to solve. I could find these type of puzzles online.I’d still recommend this place though!

room_title: Escape room "Time Warp" by Time Escape in Seattle
review: Had a great time. Staff were superb; went above and beyond to help our little party of two. Well worth the time and cost; expectations were exceeded. Fun times abound.

room_title: Escape room "Time Warp" by Time Escape in Seattle
review: Did a team event at time escape in Belltown this afternoon - first time doing one, but it was great! Did the time warp room -very interesting puzzles, definitely want to try the others in the future.
